Text: ValueFocused Financial Strategies Hyperion Webcast Developing ValueFocused Financial Strategies Hyperion Webcast What drives the value of a publiclyheld company Revenue growth Market share Profitability Over the past months it seems that the financial markets have been focusing more on profitability as the main measure of corporate value But do todays financial statements really reflect the true value of a company Please join us for this free onehour webcast sponsored by Hyperion which will focus on techniques for developing ValueFocused Financial Strategies Featured on the agenda will be Dr Robert Howell visiting professor at Dartmouths Tuck School of Business who will suggest how financial reporting can be significantly improved so that investors creditors and other stakeholders may find them more useful in making rational investment credit and similar decisions Dr Howell will elaborate on his views about driving business value based on free cash flow views which have been published in a series of articles in Fortune Magazine Then hear from Hyperion how a unified approach to Financial Management can enable improved financial reporting enhanced decisionmaking and the implementation of valuefocused financial strategies Your questions will be answered during a live interactive QA session giving you the opportunity to make specific inquiries pertaining to your organization About Your Speaker Dr Howell is Visiting Professor of Business Administration Tuck School of Business at Dartmouth and also Senior Partner of the Howell Group LLC He is renowned for his research on the valuecreating finance organization his consulting work with Fortune Global companies and his thoughts regarding the necessity for improving financial reporting practices Date
